VisualVM 1.3.7 API Specification

This document is the API specification for VisualVM 1.3.7. Zipped archive of this documentation can be downloaded here. See the Getting Started Extending VisualVM document for information about developing plugins for VisualVM.


Packages 
Package Description
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application
Support for applications in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.jvm
This package uses Jvmstat, JMX, SA and Attach API to present unifiled view for JVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.snapshot
Support for application snapshots in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.type
Package with basic ApplicationType(s).
com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.views
Support for views (subtabs) for applications and application snapshots.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.charts
Support for custom charts in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasource
Definition of DataSource and related core APIs.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasource.descriptor
Definition of DataSourceDescriptor and related core APIs.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasupport
Various helper methods and interfaces for manipulations with DataSources.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.explorer
APIs for accessing explorer tree (Applications tree).
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.model
This package provides generic support for attaching Model to DataSource.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.options
Access to general VisualVM settings defined in Options.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.properties
Support for user-customizable properties for DataSources.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.scheduler
Support for executing scheduled tasks in given intervals synchronously Eg.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.snapshot
APIs for snapshots in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui
APIs for VisualVM UI.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.actions
APIs for UI actions in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.components
Custom UI components used in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.coredump
Support for core dumps in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.heapdump
Support for heap dumps in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.host
Support for hosts in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.host.model
Model for various statistics related to Host (memory, OS, etc.)
com.sun.tools.visualvm.host.views
Support for views (subtabs) for hosts.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.jmx
JMX connections support in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.threaddump
Support for thread dumps in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.tools.attach
Attach API support in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.tools.jmx
JMX support in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.tools.jvmstat
Jvmstat support in VisualVM.
com.sun.tools.visualvm.tools.sa
Serviceability Agent support in VisualVM.
